name: Teserae
overview: Teserae was first created on the Atari ST by The Albanian Sausage Corporation - a sort of game and a demo with great music and whizzy scrolling backgrounds. I remade a version for the Amiga in the early 1990's to help learn some of the machines features. Guide the Tetris shapes to form neat lines with no gaps. Each time a line is completed it is removed from the screen and everything moves down. Complete several lines to proceed to the next, faster level. But you know how Tetris works, right?
